title: Overnight Chia Oats Recipe
description: Overnight chia oats are a delicious breakfast that can help jumpstart your day. Make several jars at a time for a few days of grab-and-go breakfasts.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Breakfast and Brunch Cereals Oatmeal Recipes Overnight Chia Oats 4.7 (25) 17 Reviews 4 Photos These overnight chia oats are an easy and nutritious way to jumpstart your day. You can customize them by adding your favorite toppings (fruit, nuts, or seeds) or using flavored almond milk. By Almond Breeze Updated on December 5, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 4 4 Prep Time: 5 mins Additional Time: 8 hrs Total Time: 8 hrs 5 mins Servings: 1 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 1 servings 1 cup Almond Breeze Vanilla almondmilk ½ cup rolled oats ½ medium banana, mashed 1 tablespoon chia seeds Directions Combine almond milk, oats, mashed banana, and chia seeds in a 1-pint jar. Seal with a lid and shake until well combined. Refrigerate until chia seeds have swelled and mixture is thick and gel-like, 8 hours to overnight. Recipe Tip Feel free to substitute in your favorite Almond Breeze flavor, such as Original, Chocolate, Unsweetened Original, Unsweetened Vanilla, Unsweetened Chocolate, Blended with Real Bananas, Coconut Almond blend, or Cashew Almond Blend. I Made It Print 99 home cooks made it! name: Almond Breeze
instructions: Combine almond milk, oats, mashed banana, and chia seeds in a 1-pint jar. Seal with a lid and shake until well combined. Refrigerate until chia seeds have swelled and mixture is thick and gel-like, 8 hours to overnight.
